query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS latency_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  source_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  latency_ms INT NOT NULL,
  endpoint VARCHAR(500),
  status_code INT,
  is_success TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_latency_source (source_type, source_id),
  INDEX idx_latency_time (recorded_at),
  INDEX idx_latency_type (source_type)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS latency_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  source_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  latency_ms INT NOT NULL,
  endpoint VARCHAR(500),
  status_code INT,
  is_success TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_latency_source (source_type, source_id),
  INDEX idx_latency_time (recorded_at),
  INDEX idx_latency_type (source_type)
)
